name: restaurant-app
description: A modern restaurant management platform with online ordering, reservations, and admin dashboard

scripts.dev:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5001
scripts.build:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run python -m build
scripts.db:setup: cd apps/backend && uv run npx prisma generate && uv run npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:studio: cd apps/backend && uv run npx prisma studio
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/backend && uv run python -m scripts.seed_restaurant_data
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd apps/backend && uv sync

author: Restaurant App Team
